name: MIS Incidents Report for PPAS
description:
This report was created during COVID-19 period to assist Prison Performance Team who are looking at including disorder incident data in it with data available at prison level.
Intention of report is to show for a variable period a breakdown of disorder incidents into their subtypes and whether incident was active or passive in nature (to be used with concerted indiscipline incident types).

INC0029 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 22/04/2020

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Incident Numbers
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('31-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) IN ('Disorder (April 2018)'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, DAY_DATE, INCIDENT_CASE_ID FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Sub Type
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_ANSWER AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_QUESTION AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK = AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK = AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('31-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) IN ('Disorder (April 2018)') AND AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('WHAT TYPE OF DISORDER INCIDENT WAS THIS?'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, DAY_DATE, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, ANSWER_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: CI
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_ANSWER AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_QUESTION AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK = AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK = AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('31-03-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) IN ('Disorder (April 2018)') AND AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('DESCRIBE THE INCIDENT AS EITHER ACTIVE OR PASSIVE'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, DAY_DATE, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, ANSWER_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_SUB_RESPONSE_DESC
field.legacySql: =[Sub Type].[Incident Response Description] In ([Incident Numbers].[Incident Number])
